messages.continueOrStartNew: You can continue your previous game or start a new one.

sessions.title: No Sessions Yet
sessions.description: Create your first Sudoku session to get started.

confirmRefresh.title: Generate New Boards?
confirmRefresh.description: You have a game in progress. Generating new boards will overwrite your current progress. Are you sure you want to continue?

confirmNewGame.title: Start New Game?
confirmNewGame.description: You have a game in progress. Starting a new game will overwrite your current progress. Are you sure you want to continue?

confirmDelete.title: Delete Session?
confirmDelete.description: This will permanently delete this session and all its progress. This action cannot be undone.

confirmClearBoard.title: Clear Board?
confirmClearBoard.description: This will clear all your answers on the current board. Your timer will be reset. Are you sure?

confirmPlayAgain.title: Play Again?
confirmPlayAgain.description: This will reset the board and start fresh. Your completion time will be lost. Are you sure?

confirmSmartFill.title: Smart Fill Candidates?
confirmSmartFill.description: This will auto-fill all possible candidates for every empty cell. Any existing candidates will be replaced. Continue?

stats.title: Statistics
stats.noData: No statistics available yet. Complete some puzzles to see your stats!
stats.noBestTimes: Complete puzzles to see your best times!
stats.noTimeData: Complete puzzles to see time distribution!

emptyState.activities: No activity recorded yet. Complete some puzzles to see your activity!
